green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: looking for a book?
messages.msgSnippet: You can purchase it here:  http://www.freechild.info/ Buy a copy for friends and family too!! It s a really great book. Rue s gentle voice shines throughout.

messages.subject: looking for a book?
messages.msgSnippet: Was is here that I saw someone posting Parenting a free child: An Unschooled Life ?  It is not in a Library database.  Can u only purchase it? Thanks~Angela
messages.messageBody:
Was is here that I saw someone posting "Parenting a free child: An
Unschooled Life"? It is not in a Library database. Can u only
purchase it?

Thanks~Angela
